tool_description: Based on AI algorithm to intelligently identify the range of faces in the image and blur the faces in the image.
name: Face Mosaic
title: Face Mosaic

api_list.name: Face Mosaic

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `JPEG` `JPG` `PNG` `BMP`
- **Image size**: No more than 3 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 32x32px, smaller than 5000x5000px.
